article_title: GM, Ford, FCA to close all factories, AP reports
article_description: Detroit s big three automakers are to shut down all factories due to fears over the coronavirus  This comes by way of the Associated Press citing a person close the matter  GM  Ford  and FCA are expected to the plans later today  Over the last few days  the U
